title: Hooked on a Serialized Novel!
detail_text: <:th_ch0204/>Here, Setsuna. It’s the magazine you asked for.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waah, thank you so much! I gave up because it’s sold out in all the bookstores~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s quite unusual for you to read fashion magazines, Setsuna.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Fufufu.... This isn’t just an ordinary fashion magazine! The serialized novel at the end of this magazine is the best!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>The serialized novel....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah. The main character is a woman who works in the fashion industry. But one day, at a fashion show, a giant monster attacks! The monster’s heat ray then engulfed the main character, and the ancient DNA within her was awakened. Because of that, she turned into a giant robot and fought the monster!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Wait! Her Ancient DNA was awakened, and she.... turned into a robot?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah.... She did! Don’t mind the details, as long as it’s interesting, it’s okay! It’s a three-way fight between the fashion industry, the monster, and the robot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Wait! The fashion industry.... is also in the fight?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yeah.... It is! It’s a heated battle!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Now I’m really curious. Let me read it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
